'''Discerner of Enigmas''' is a [[Character Event Wish-2]] in [[Version 4.0]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2023-08-16 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2023-09-05 17:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Valley Orchid" [[Yelan]] ({{Hydro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Elegance in the Shadows" [[Lynette]] ({{Anemo}}), "Trial by Fire" [[Bennett]] ({{Pyro}}), and "Shining Idol" [[Barbara]] ({{Hydro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
